sections.Biography:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
At [[Castle Black]], [[Jon Snow]] orders Wendel to make sure the quivers are full and the torches are dry while preparing for his [[Raid on Craster's Keep|raid]] of [[Craster's Keep]]. After talking to [[Gared Tuttle]], Jon once again confronts Duff about the arrows.<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
